Description:
Tranquil charm with Tuscan inspirations
Revel in the breathtaking beauty of this magnificent 13 acre Tuscan style property, with rolling green hills creating the perfect backdrop for a harmonious country lifestyle just minutes from modern amenities. Idyllic in every aspect, this substantial dual storey haven combines relaxed family living with impressive entertaining options. Inviting interiors flaunt lofty timber ceilings complemented by an abundance of natural light and majestic bushland scenery. The carefully considered floorplan features a formal lounge/dining warmed by open fire. A stylish kitchen/meals indulges timber accents hosting s/s appliances, 900mm oven, WI pantry, gas cooktop and breakfast bar adjoining a 2nd living zone with direct access to the superbly elevated deck and spa displaying glorious 180 degree views of the uninterrupted surrounds and sparkling inground solar heated pool. A modern bathroom with semi-frameless shower convenes the lower level.
The sunbathed 2nd level promotes serene landscapes from every window, accommodating 4 generous bedrooms with BIR, plus study, serviced by a stylish family bathroom. The master boasts a WIR and opulent ensuite with spa bath overlooking an enviable rooftop alfresco. Ideal for equine pursuits or livestock, the picturesque 13 approx acres includes 2 private dams, stable and storage shed. Close to highly regarded schools including Warranwood PS, Park Orchards PS, St Anne's PS, Yarra Valley GS and Luther College. A short drive to the shops and cafes of Goldfields Plaza, Ringwood North and Eastland. Close to the Yarra River walking tracks, wineries, private and public bus services and freeway/Eastlink. Displaying the beauty of nature in enormous proportions, this is a home that needs to be seen to be believed! Further enhancements include; gas ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, plantation shutters and refurbished floorboards upstairs, ample laundry, stable/tack room, storage shed, chicken pen, cubby house, 2.5 car remote garage with internal access plus additional carport.
